name: Hohmann Havoc
description:
*Created for Ludum Dare 38 Compo*

Hohmann Havoc is a 2D space arcade shooter. You fly a space ship around a small world protecting it from the massive asteroids that seek to destroy it!

Instructions:
WASD or arrow keys to move ship
A and D rotate your ship
W and S control your forward thrust
Spacebar to fire

This game utilizes a realistic (albeit two dimensional) physics system (e.g. inverse square gravity). You will need to master these orbital mechanics if you are to save your world for any respectable amount of time. Good luck, pilot!

Source: https://github.com/rdpgamedev/Hohmann-Havoc
